channel.title: R Ladies London on Ángela Castillo-Gill
channel.description: Recent content in R Ladies London on Ángela Castillo-Gill

item.title: Data science interviews: Lessons learned
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Why? 3 Here’s how I spent my time 4 What would I have done differently? 4.1 Schedule interviews further apart and when possible, in your peak time (i.e. morning or evening person) 4.2 Focus on the basics and then move on to more complex things. 4.3 Rehearse not knowing, or being wrong, and feeling embarrased/nervous/uncomfortable and STILL speaking with confidence 4.4 Recruiters can be a great support but it’s important to set boundaries 5 What would I do again?
